ygData.subject: Re: spell idea
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe that SOW is perfect as is. Let the Druids and Shamans have it.  You can always get journyman boots later levels that gives you SOW, plus as a bonus
ygData.messageBody:
I believe that SOW is perfect as is. Let the Druids and Shamans have it. You can always get journyman boots later
levels that gives you SOW, plus as a bonus they make you unrootable.

-Nuluk

mtrip@... wrote:

> From: mtrip@...
>
> I came up with a great idea for a new necro/sk spell. Call it "ghost walk". Like SoW, but it only works at night.
> Anybody like the idea, and if so how do we get the idea to the right people to make it happen?
>
> Baklaal 11 Troll/SK
